<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--- DAGDeltaAlgorithm.cpp - A DAG Minimization Algorithm --&#42;- C++ -&#42;--===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm we use attempts to exploit the dependency information by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// minimizing top-down. We start by constructing an initial root set R, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then iteratively:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 Minimize the set R using the test predicate:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       P&#39;(S) = P(S union pred&#42;(S))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 Extend R to R&#39; = R union pred(R).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// until a fixed point is reached.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The idea is that we want to quickly prune entire portions of the graph, so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try to find high-level nodes that can be eliminated with all of their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependents.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: The current algorithm doesn&#39;t actually provide a strong guarantee</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// about the minimality of the result. The problem is that after adding nodes to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the required set, we no longer consider them for elimination. For strictly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// well formed predicates, this doesn&#39;t happen, but it commonly occurs in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// practice when there are unmodelled dependencies. I believe we can resolve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this by allowing the required set to be minimized as well, but need more test</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cases first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/dagdeltaalgorithm-h">llvm/ADT/DAGDeltaAlgorithm.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/deltaalgorithm-h">llvm/ADT/DeltaAlgorithm.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#adee0e07a9f4606d965c319cd0b62052c"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#adee0e07a9f4606d965c319cd0b62052c">DAGDeltaAlgorithmImpl::DAGDeltaAlgorithmImpl</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : DDA(DDA) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a17d845c1967f9530c93fc25fe88ab507">change&#95;ty</a> Change : Changes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Predecessors.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Change, std::vector&lt;change&#95;ty&gt;()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Successors.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Change, std::vector&lt;change&#95;ty&gt;()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a8d053db58c92b4617a06ef3f9a93d339">edge&#95;ty</a> &amp;Dep : Dependencies) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Predecessors&#91;Dep.second&#93;.push&#95;back(Dep.first);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Successors&#91;Dep.first&#93;.push&#95;back(Dep.second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the roots.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a17d845c1967f9530c93fc25fe88ab507">change&#95;ty</a> Change : Changes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (succ&#95;begin(Change) == succ&#95;end(Change))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Roots.push&#95;back(Change);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pre-compute the closure of the successor relation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;change&#95;ty&gt; Worklist(Roots.begin(), Roots.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#a503c0214540e80733c0a0c53c067e6ee">while</a> (!Worklist.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    change&#95;ty Change = Worklist.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Worklist.pop&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::set&lt;change&#95;ty&gt; &amp;ChangeSuccs = SuccClosure&#91;Change&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    for (pred&#95;iterator&#95;ty it = pred&#95;begin(Change),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">           ie = pred&#95;end(Change); it != ie; ++it) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SuccClosure&#91;&#42;it&#93;.insert(Change);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SuccClosure&#91;&#42;it&#93;.insert(ChangeSuccs.begin(), ChangeSuccs.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Worklist.push&#95;back(&#42;it);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invert to form the predecessor closure map.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (change&#95;ty Change : Changes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PredClosure.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Change, std::set&lt;change&#95;ty&gt;()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a4cfc8b177e8521a4b496ae2edff6244f">for</a> (change&#95;ty Change : Changes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (succ&#95;closure&#95;iterator&#95;ty it2 = succ&#95;closure&#95;begin(Change),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  ie2 = succ&#95;closure&#95;end(Change);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">         it2 != ie2; ++it2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PredClosure&#91;&#42;it2&#93;.insert(Change);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FailedTestsCache.insert(Extended);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a3f8cd32d8d69f713bf3c1dbeb942273a">DAGDeltaAlgorithm::changeset&#95;ty</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a16e6564221ac63609404d50bc83eb093"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a16e6564221ac63609404d50bc83eb093">DAGDeltaAlgorithmImpl::Run</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The current set of changes we are minimizing, starting at the roots.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a35737e034ee6cffbced3f2b44b91e3e1">changeset&#95;ty</a> CurrentSet(Roots.begin(), Roots.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The set of required changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a35737e034ee6cffbced3f2b44b91e3e1">changeset&#95;ty</a> Required;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate until the active set of changes is empty. Convergence is guaranteed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assuming input was a DAG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invariant:  CurrentSet intersect Required == &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invariant:  Required == (Required union succ&#42;(Required))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CurrentSet.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9a7b5c68c90f85baaedaa854cc5002cc">llvm::errs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;DAG&#95;DD - &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; CurrentSet.size() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; active changes, &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   &lt;&lt; Required.size() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; required changes\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Minimize the current set of changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a0257793bd56ff42d04a2dfbb40285eb4">DeltaActiveSetHelper</a> Helper(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Required);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a35737e034ee6cffbced3f2b44b91e3e1">changeset&#95;ty</a> CurrentMinSet = Helper.Run(CurrentSet);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the set of required changes. Since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   CurrentMinSet subset CurrentSet</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and after the last iteration,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   succ(CurrentSet) subset Required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   succ(CurrentMinSet) subset Required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and our invariant on Required is maintained.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Required.insert(CurrentMinSet.begin(), CurrentMinSet.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace the current set with the predecssors of the minimized set of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// active changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurrentSet.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dagdeltaalgorithm-cpp-/dagdeltaalgorithmimpl/#a17d845c1967f9530c93fc25fe88ab507">change&#95;ty</a> CT : CurrentMinSet)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentSet.insert(pred&#95;begin(CT), pred&#95;end(CT));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: We could enforce CurrentSet intersect Required == &#123;&#125; here if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wanted to protect against cyclic graphs.</span></CodeLine>
